high_descs: Go to the sinks on your right.
Pick up the bottle of hand soap that is closest to you from between the two sinks.
Turn right and walk to the toilet.
Put the bottle of soap on the back of the toilet.
anns.task_desc: Move a bottle of hand soap from the sink to the toilet.

high_descs: Turn right and walk up to the counter between the sinks
Pick up the pump bottle nearest the counter's edge from the counter
Turn right and walk up to the toilet
Put the pump bottle on the back of the toilet
anns.task_desc: Put the pump bottle on the toilet

high_descs: Walk towards the sink on your right.
Pick up the bottle on the right which is closest to you.
Turn around and head towards the toilet.
Place the bottle on the toilet basin next to the wall.
anns.task_desc: Place the bottle from the sink to the toilet basin.
